text: The District of Nyon is a district in the canton of Vaud, Switzerland. The seat of the district is the city of Nyon. ==Municipalities== On 1 September 2006, Nyon was reorganized. There are now fewer municipalities.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 Municipalities of Nyon Name Population () Area km²Swiss Federal Statistical Office-Land Use Statistics 2009 data accessed 25 March 2010 Pre-2006 district Arnex-sur-Nyon Nyon Arzier Nyon Bassins Nyon Begnins Nyon Bogis-Bossey Nyon Borex Nyon Bursinel Rolle Bursins Rolle Burtigny Rolle Chavannes-de-Bogis Nyon Chavannes-des-Bois Nyon Chéserex Nyon Coinsins Nyon Commugny Nyon Coppet Nyon Crans-près-Céligny Nyon Crassier Nyon Duillier Nyon Dully Rolle Essertines-sur-Rolle Rolle Eysins Nyon Founex Nyon Genolier Nyon Gilly Rolle Gingins Nyon Givrins Nyon Gland Nyon Grens Nyon La Rippe Nyon Le Vaud Nyon Longirod Aubonne Luins Rolle Marchissy Aubonne Mies Nyon Mont-sur-Rolle Rolle Nyon Nyon Perroy Rolle Prangins Nyon Rolle Rolle Saint-Cergue Nyon Saint-George Aubonne Signy-Avenex Nyon Tannay Nyon Tartegnin Rolle Trélex Nyon Vich Nyon Vinzel Rolle Total 253 .7 ==References==
